description: Here's a quick guide to help you get started with Jeeves, our guild management bot. Follow these steps to set up your account and keep your character information organized!

fields.name: /affix
fields.value: Display the current Mythic+ affixes for the week.

fields.name: /worldboss
fields.value: Check the current World Boss and their location.
